text: you know I don't really know how to get
into it oh man i'm still grappling with
how to explain the verdict to my child
because i'm still trying to figure out
the verdict myself
with my three teenagers they they don't
understand all the hate each time I saw
a car going up in flames tears were just
flowing from my eyes and my kids
couldn't get it I don't want my child to
be like no not knowing what's going on
it's gonna be part of history it's gonna
be a mystery but we let them know
violence is inevitable eight-year-old
said you know mom I want to you know
helicopters go away just wants to be
able to sleep at night and I just told
him that there were some bad people out
doing some you know bad things and she
wanted to know why things were being
burned down and my answer again rage
anger they're just pissed you know as he
looks at his favorite place which is
little ceasars being burned out to the
ground his first reaction was oh they
burned my scissors you know it's sad
it's hard to explain a whole history of
race relations to a nine-year-old I have
to continuously talk about racism I have
to continuously talk about safety and
protection and protocol and some of that
I don't want to explain because you want
to preserve their childhood of innocent
thoughts you don't want to explain
oppression because you don't want them
to grow up feeling oppressed I want her
to know that her life is valued as being
a african-american child you know he's
he's tall for his age he's thick for his
age and I'm afraid as he grows up that
he's going to be you know a big burly
guy like a Mike Brown I'm gonna have to
tell me something I don't really know
how I'm gonna put it into words explain
to my children that they are very big
problems at humanity faces at various
times battles big battles are fought in
different forums and Ferguson happened
to be the one where this battle was
going to be fought I don't I don't want
them to be confused about anything
I try to be more positive I can't
explain it to their I try to prepare
them no I teach them to love all human
beings I'll let them do the half the
questions and I'll just do the answers
